trans-unit.source: The LegendCollection class is implemented as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A> collection property of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: A classe de LegendCollection é implementada como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A>propriedade da coleção da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> objects can be appended, inserted or removed from the collection at either design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>objetos podem ser acrescentados, inserir ou removidos da coleção no momento da conceção ou tempo de execução.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCollection.Count> property indicates the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to find the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCollection.Count>propriedade indica o número total de itens na coleção e, normalmente é utilizada para localizar o limite superior da coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCollection.Count>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> objeto para o fim da colecção.

trans-unit.source: The name of legend to be added.
trans-unit.target: O nome da legenda para adição.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the index of the added item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o índice do item adicionado.
